body:
## Version information

Android Studio `3.1.1` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 23.2.2` • Dart plugin `173.4700`

No Flutter sdk configured.

## Exception

Write-unsafe context! Model changes are allowed from write-safe contexts only. Please ensure you're using invokeLater/invokeAndWait with a correct modality state (not "any"). See TransactionGuard documentation for details.
  current modality=ModalityState:{[com.intellij.openapi.ui.impl.DialogWrapperPeerImpl$MyDialog[dialog0,395,39,816x689,invalid,layout=java.awt.BorderLayout,APPLICATION_MODAL,title=Create New Flutter Project,defaultCloseOperation=DO_NOTHING_ON_CLOSE,rootPane=com.intellij.openapi.ui.impl.DialogWrapperPeerImpl$MyDialog$DialogRootPane[,8,31,800x650,invalid,layout=javax.swing.JRootPane$RootLayout,alignmentX=0.0,alignmentY=0.0,border=,flags=449,maximumSize=,minimumSize=,preferredSize=],rootPaneCheckingEnabled=true]]}
  known modalities:
    ModalityState:{[com.intellij.openapi.ui.impl.DialogWrapperPeerImpl$MyDialog[dialog0,395,39,816x689,invalid,layout=java.awt.BorderLayout,APPLICATION_MODAL,title=Create New Flutter Project,defaultCloseOperation=DO_NOTHING_ON_CLOSE,rootPane=com.intellij.openapi.ui.impl.DialogWrapperPeerImpl$MyDialog$DialogRootPane[,8,31,800x650,invalid,layout=javax.swing.JRootPane$RootLayout,alignmentX=0.0,alignmentY=0.0,border=,flags=449,maximumSize=,minimumSize=,preferredSize=],rootPaneCheckingEnabled=true]]}, writingAllowed=true;
    ModalityState.NON_MODAL, writingAllowed=true


title: Exception : Write-unsafe context! Model changes are allowed from write-safe contexts only.
